meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #1229.

td.p: Mike Carter, an attorney from Norman, Oklahoma
Nancy Miller, a homemaker from Cuyahoga Falls, Ohio
Robert Baker, a pediatrician from Atlantic City, New Jersey (whose 1-day cash winnings total $15,600)

tr.td: STARTS WITH "B"
THE 1980s
ASTROLOGY
TV LANDLORDS
CITIES
HUMPTY DUMPTY

barnacles

And don't allow the day /
Here inside, where I hide with my loneliness..."
